alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 06 at 10:08PM EST until further notice by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST/9 AM CST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...All of southern Indiana and portions of north central Kentucky. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST/9 AM CST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Additional 1 to locally 2 inches of rainfall possible through Monday morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
